statements.statement: SELECT a.DEPTCODE as ORG_CD, a.DEPTNAME as ORG_NM, a.PARCODE as SUPER_ORG_CD, 1 as SEQ FROM VW_DEPT a
INSERT INTO post_dept ( dept_id, dept_name, par_id, seq, updt_dt ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ifnull(?,''), ?, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dept_name = ?, par_id = ifnull(?,''), seq = ? , updt_dt=now()
DELETE FROM post_dept where ( now() - updt_dt ) > 604800
